note:
🎥 Producer, director, and Showrunner of nonfiction content for networks/platforms like: ABC, Netflix, Discovery, Bravo, YouTube, TLC, Nat Geo, MTV, and Snapchat.
📺 Credits include: “Battlebots” (Discovery), “Friday Night Tykes” (Esquire), "Extreme Makeover Home Edition" (ABC), "The Rachel Zoe Project" (Bravo), and "OutDaughtered" (TLC).  🎙️ Host of the “No Script, No Problem” podcast
